articles.title: See this volcano in Indonesia erupt
articles.description: Mount Sinabung in Indonesia erupted on March 2, launching a cloud of ash and dust several kilometers into the sky. No one was injured in the eruption but authorities have warned people to stay away from the crater.

articles.title: Black celebrities show support for LGBTQ community in Ghana after raid on center
articles.description: Black celebrities are urging Ghana's President Nana Akufo-Addo to work with LGBTQ community leaders after security forces raided and shut down an LGBTQ center in the West African country's capital last week.
